text:
Do you have a spare 15 mins this Christmas break?

As the Christmas break approaches and we all take time to reflect on the past year and make resolutions for the year to come why not also take a moment to reflect on your future career?

Discover your career profile (There are seven career profiles, which one are you?)
Find out how your career expectations match up to other students.
See a list of employers that fit your career profile that you might not have considered. 
Get a free CV check and become even more competitive in your job search.
 
You can participate by clicking here https://buff.ly/2OA79nY  
 
This survey is brought to you by City, University of London in partnership with Universum. 

This test is available for a limited time only. Your answers and results are confidential and always kept anonymous. If you have any inquiries, feedback or concerns you are welcome to contact us at info.universum@career-test.com.

text:
Take part in the 2019 Universum Career Test and have your voice heard on top UK employers.

You will also receive a profile analysis on your Career Type, strengths and opportunities for growth, success stories, suggested companies that best match your preferences, a free CV-check and a soft skills report including information on what soft skills employers are looking for when hiring new talent.
You can participate by clicking here https://buff.ly/2OA79nY  
 
This survey is brought to you by City, University of London in partnership with Universum. 

This test is available for a limited time only. Your answers and results are confidential and always kept anonymous. If you have any inquiries, feedback or concerns you are welcome to contact us at info.universum@career-test.com.

text:
***FENCING NEWS***

Due to the popularity of our first Learn to Fence programme, we will be running another course in 2019!

Our 10 week programme, starting on 6th February 2019, is open to City students wishing to give the sport a go. 

We anticipate this course filling up fast, therefore places will be offered on a first come, first served basis. The course costs ¬£15 and will be available to book on Wednesday 2nd January 2019. 

Students will need to register their details on the CitySport website prior to coming in or phoning to book and pay. 

*Students will need to commit to the whole programme and cannot join after the course has commenced
